official_title: A bill to authorize voluntary withholding of Maryland and Virginia income taxes in the case of Members of Congress and congressional employees.

summary.text: Authorizes the voluntary withholding of Maryland and Virginia income taxes in the case of Members of Congress and congressional employees.

titles.title: A bill to authorize voluntary withholding of Maryland and Virginia income taxes in the case of Members of Congress and congressional employees.
